description:
Kyoko's introduction from Danganronpa

Project files: https://1drv.ms/u/s!AoSaHHuyILLNhI0AfIKpox5g52xffA?e=ZtcWWK

So that you can use this as a template for other DR1 characters. All of the assets are extracted from the game, except the sprite, which is from DRV3 because it's higher quality and I downloaded it from DR Wiki.
title: Kyoko Kirigiri Introduction | Danganronpa: Trigger Happy Havoc
